    温馨提示：
        抵制不良代码，拒绝乱用代码。

        注意自我保护，谨防上当受骗。

        适当编程益脑，沉迷编程伤身。

        合理安排时间，享受健康生活！

from collections import Iterable

import torch
from torchhelper.base.recordable import Recordable


[docs]class TrainParam(Recordable):
    """用于Trainer 训练过程中获取参数使用"""
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__(None)
        self.global_step = 0
        self.epoch = 5
        self.eidx = 0
        self.idx = 0
        self.topk = (1, 5)

    def _can_in_dir_name(self, obj):
        for i in [int, float, str, bool]:
            if isinstance(obj, i):
                return True
        if isinstance(obj, torch.Tensor):
            if len(obj.shape) == 0:
                return True
        return False


[docs]    def build_exp_name(self, names: Iterable, prefix="", sep="_", ignore_mode="add"):
        prefix = prefix.strip()
        res = []
        if len(prefix) != 0:
            res.append(prefix)
        if ignore_mode == "add":
            for name in names:
                if hasattr(self, name):
                    obj = getattr(self, name)
                    if self._can_in_dir_name(obj):
                        res.append("{}={}".format(name, obj))
                else:
                    res.append(name)
        elif ignore_mode == "del":
            for name in names:
                if hasattr(self, name):
                    obj = getattr(self, name)
                    if self._can_in_dir_name(obj):
                        res.append("{}={}".format(name, obj))
        else:
            assert False

        self._exp_name = sep.join(res)
        return self._exp_name



[docs]    def get_exp_name(self):
        assert hasattr(self, "_exp_name"), "please first call build_exp_path()!"

        return self._exp_name



[docs]class LogMeter(Recordable):
    def __init__(self, default_type=None):
        super().__init__(default_type)
        self._mapfn = lambda d: d


[docs]    def set_mapfn(self, fn):
        self._mapfn = fn



[docs]    def logdict(self)->dict:
        res = self._mapfn(super().logdict())
        return res



[docs]    def updata(self,**kwargs):
        for k,v in kwargs.items():
            self[k] = v


    @property
    def k(self):
        return self._k

    def __repr__(self) -> str:
        return " - ".join(["@{}={}".format(k,v) for k,v in self.logdict().items()])
